outlook.title: How to Send/Receive Encrypted Emails
outlook.text: In this knowledge base article, we go over the steps to work with encrypted emails.

outlook.title: Email Add-ons
outlook.text: Email add-ons not functioning as they should? File a service request for assistance.

outlook.title: Other Issues
outlook.text: Emails not loading? Outlook client freezing? For all other Outlook issues, file a service request for assistance.

citrix.title: Report Connectivity Issues
citrix.text: If you are having difficulty with Citrix connection speed / glitches, use this form to file a service request for assistance.

citrix.title: Reset Citrix PIN
citrix.text: Forgot your Citrix pin? File a service request to get it reset.

citrix.title: Request Access to Beta Version
citrix.text: Want to try out currently experimental Citrix builds? Submit a request here.

equipment.title: How to Access iPhone Voicemail
equipment.text: In this knowledge base article, we go over the steps to access your vociemail on your company issued iPhone.

equipment.title: Request IT Equipment
equipment.text: Need an office issued iPhone, tablet, or computer monitor? File a request to receive one here.

equipment.title: Report Broken Equipment
equipment.text: Accidents happen. Report any broken IT equipment in your possession here.

equipment.title: Ergonomic Accomodation
equipment.text: If you have need of office equipment, file a service request here. Please note that ergonomic equipment requires you to provide documents stating its necessity.

other.title: Generic Service Request
other.text: File a service request with Support Central.

other.title: Generic Incident Request
other.text: File an incident with Support Central.

imeps.title: IMEP Intake
imeps.text: File an IMEP Intake Form. The letter of offer must be signed by all required parties.

teams.title: New 'Microsoft Teams' Team
teams.text: File a request for a new 'Microsoft Teams' Team to be created.
